name: Pick up Star
description:
Works with gamepad, tested with PS3 controllers.

May have problems with some browsers, but Internet Explorer do its job...

The game was made just for fun to learn using Unity 3D, so there's only this level. 

If you wanna more levels, I accept paid requests with a minimum of 1 million dollars for level... ok, for a million dollar I can make the complete game! XD

Keys are in the game hud at the bottom left.

PS: check my Patreon page for other free games:

https://www.patreon.com/ilraffo

(subscribers can obtain the downloadable version in full hd resolution)
